title: Secluded Adults-Only Retreat with Views of NSW’s famed South Coast

Here, feel day-to-day life melt away with a complimentary bottle of wine on arrival, lazy 12pm checkout and two A$25 spa credits per room included.
offer_address: 260 Mt Hay Road, Berry, New South Wales 2535, Australia

title: Charming Berry Country Escape with Daily Breakfast & Welcome Wine
description:
Leave the city life behind and embrace the serenity of the charming village of Berry on NSW's South Coast with a stay at Berry Village Boutique Motel. Perfectly positioned in the heart of the historic town and recently renovated, this modern property takes you just a stone’s throw from the heritage buildings, welcoming wineries, award-winning restaurants and boutique shops that make Berry one of the most loved destinations in country NSW.

Your escape includes daily breakfast, a bottle of wine on arrival and a cheese platter to share.

title: Charming Berry Country Escape with Daily Breakfast
description:
Leave city life behind and seek serenity in the charming village of Berry, on New South Wales' South Coast, with a stay at the newly refurbished Berry Village Boutique Motel. Perfectly positioned in the heart of the historic village, this recently renovated modern property sits a stone's throw from heritage buildings, welcoming wineries, award-winning restaurants and boutique shops - all of which make Berry one of the most loved destinations in country New South Wales.

While retaining its old-world characteristics, the revitalised motel oozes 21st-century style across 25 masterfully appointed rooms and its tastefully furnished lounge. Enjoy outstanding service and country elegance as days are spent exploring nearby vineyards, beaches and verdant landscapes, tasting your way through the village's thriving culinary scene or browsing for one-of-a-kind antiques and collectables at the local market.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Indulge in a delicious daily cooked breakfast with à la carte options and barista-made coffee or tea
- Celebrate on arrival with a bottle of wine ready and waiting
- Delight in a delicious cheese platter with a selection of cheeses and fruit

**Balcony Upgrades**: Sit out on your private balcony and take in the property's serene surroundings when you upgrade to a Deluxe Queen or Deluxe King room.

title: Grand Opening: NSW Luxury Cottages for up to Eight Guests in the Heart of Berry with Private Pools
description: Be one of the first to experience the impeccably designed Maple Cottages by Linnaeus Collection set within the charming town of Berry, just a short walk from eclectic boutiques and scrumptious cafes. Standing side by side, the pair of stunning modern cottages boast luxurious fireplaces, sparkling swimming pools and fully equipped kitchens, laundry, living and dining spaces. Step inside to find a blend of traditional timber, modern amenities and stunning architecture, and when it's time to tear yourself away from this secluded paradise, drive a few minutes to the sparkling Seven Mile Beach shoreline. Ideal for larger fun-loving groups of friends, colleagues after a city escape just under two hours from Sydney or families keen on nature-filled adventures - double the fun and book both properties at once.
offer_address: 27 Albert Street, Berry, 2535, New South Wales, Australia

title: Private Hinterland Lodge Escape Just Two Hours from Sydney
description: Discover the rolling green hills, abundance of wildlife and spectacular views of New South Wales’ south coast hinterland with an escape to Berry. Just two hours’ drive from Sydney, this small village is the ultimate spot to unwind while enjoying the quaint country charm. Includes a country breakfast hamper, welcome bottle of wine on arrival and a welcome box of chocolates.

Perched atop the rolling green pastures of Mt Hay, this is an adults-only private haven and rural escape like no other. title: NSW Countryside Cottage Estate Retreat near Seven Mile Beach National Park for up to 10 Guests
description:
Enjoy serene countryside bliss near the charming village of Berry with a relaxed stay at Linnaeus Farm, a beautifully designed retreat just two hours from Sydney and minutes from the shores of Seven Mile Beach National Park. Be greeted by an incredible stone entry and tree-lined driveway leading to an idyllic, five-bedroom cottage set among 8.4 acres of manicured gardens and rolling hills. Step inside to find a blend of traditional timber, modern amenities and stunning architecture. Outside, enjoy 360-degree views from your sun-soaked outdoor deck, take a dip in the glistening swimming pool or wander through the many offerings of the expansive grounds, including terraced organic edible gardens, a traditionally designed barn, two dams, orchards and a delightful children's playground with a cubby house.

When it's time to tear yourself away from this secluded paradise, head out to explore Seven Mile Beach National Park. Frolic along the coast before heading inland to browse through handicrafts at vibrant artisan markets in Berry or venture to the Cambewarra Mountain Lookout for panoramic vistas.
offer_address: 27 Albert Street, Berry, 2535, New South Wales, Australia

title: Boutique Adults-Only Berry Suites Just Two Hours from Sydney
description: Mt Hay Retreat, located just two hours from Sydney on the NSW South Coast, offers an exclusive adults-only getaway for those seeking tranquility and relaxation. Nestled amidst the picturesque landscapes of Berry, this suite-only retreat offers the best of both worlds, allowing guests to unwind in the privacy of self-contained spaces, or by the 33m heated indoor pool and spa, sky-scraping 'Cloud Swing' or kitchen garden.
offer_address: 260 Mt Hay Road, Berry, New South Wales 2535, Australia
